title: A brief history of Apple - the company behind your favorite gadgets
summary: Apple Inc. was founded in Cupertino, California, U.S. in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne. The companyâ€™s first product was the Apple II computer, which was released in 1977. Jobs was fired from the company in 1985 and helped start a revolution in business and consumer technology with the introduction of the first iPod. In 2011, Jobs resigned as CEO and was succeeded by Tim Cook, who has led Apple since then.
